member.summary: The Default layout engine.

member.name: M:Miyagi.UI.Controls.Layout.DefaultLayout.Layout(Miyagi.UI.Controls.Control,Miyagi.UI.Controls.Layout.LayoutEventArgs)
member.summary: Performs the layout for the given container. The default layout only deals with anchors and docking.
member.param: The control whose layout has to be done.
member.returns: Always false.

member.name: M:Miyagi.UI.Controls.Layout.DefaultLayout.HorizontalAnchor(Miyagi.Common.Data.Rectangle,Miyagi.UI.Controls.Control,Miyagi.UI.AnchorStyles,System.Int32@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Calculates the horizontal anchoring for a given control relative to a given space. This includes the left position and the width of the control.
member.param: The rectangle where the control lays.
The type of anchor for the control.
Initially stores the left position of the control, it is modified according to the anchor.
Initially stores the width of the control, is is modified according to the anchor.
member.remarks: It can be that the value saved for the distance to the right inside the control is changed too.

member.name: M:Miyagi.UI.Controls.Layout.DefaultLayout.LayoutAnchoredChildren(Miyagi.UI.Controls.Control)
member.summary: Does the layout for anchored children, which are the ones that preserve the distance to a set of specified edges.

member.name: M:Miyagi.UI.Controls.Layout.DefaultLayout.LayoutAutoSizedChildren(Miyagi.UI.Controls.IControlCollectionOwner)
member.summary: Adjusts the size of children with the AutoSize property, except if they are docked.
member.param: The parent control whose children are to be adjusted.

member.name: M:Miyagi.UI.Controls.Layout.DefaultLayout.LayoutDockedChildren(Miyagi.UI.Controls.Control)
member.summary: Does the layout for docked children, which are children that can grow to fit a specified edge, or take all the remaining space.

member.name: M:Miyagi.UI.Controls.Layout.DefaultLayout.LayoutTopLevelControl(Miyagi.UI.Controls.Control)
member.summary: Adjusts the size of the parent control if it has the AutoSize property and it is a top level control.

member.name: M:Miyagi.UI.Controls.Layout.DefaultLayout.VerticalAnchor(Miyagi.Common.Data.Rectangle,Miyagi.UI.Controls.Control,Miyagi.UI.AnchorStyles,System.Int32@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Calculates the vertical anchoring for a given control relative to a given space. This includes the top position and the height of the control.
member.param: The rectangle where the control lays.
The type of anchor for the control.
Initially stores the top position of the control, it is modified according to the anchor.
Initially stores the height of the control, is is modified according to the anchor.
member.remarks: It can be that the value saved for the distance to the bottom inside the control is changed too.
